Title: [CAP-01] Unified capture timestamps for audio/video/IMU
Description: Implement synchronized capture clock and export trace logs; DoD: max drift <= 50 ms on 20 validation sessions.

Title: [CAP-02] Depth availability and validity flags in capture contract
Description: Add depth availability, confidence validity, and fallback reason fields in ios_capture_v1 payload.

Title: [CAP-03] AR onboarding for ROI water positioning
Description: Build AR setup flow with green ROI zone and readiness checks for angle, water visibility, and exposure.

Title: [CAP-04] Freeze ios_capture_v1 contract and version policy
Description: Publish final schema, compatibility policy, and validation checklist; tag as contract freeze for pilot.

Title: [CAP-05] Offline replay pipeline for reproducible inference
Description: Implement deterministic replay from capture payload to fusion outputs with model/config hash tracing.

Title: [CAP-06] Capture quality telemetry dashboard stub
Description: Create basic dashboard feed for ROI loss, motion, low-SNR, and reject/repeat rates.

Title: [CLN-01] Clinical operator SOP rollout in pilot site
Description: Train at least 2 operators and record competency checklist completion for site readiness.

Title: [GOV-01] Intended use and non-claims freeze memo
Description: Finalize intended use wording and non-claims boundaries; sign off by RA/QA and Clinical Lead.

Title: [ML-01] Late-fusion baseline training pipeline
Description: Train baseline audio/video/geometry model with reproducible run metadata and artifact registry.

Title: [ML-02] Uncertainty calibration for sigma outputs
Description: Calibrate sigma_h/sigma_V/sigma_Q against validation set; add uncertainty coverage report.

Title: [ML-03] Quality score and valid/repeat/reject policy
Description: Tune policy thresholds and document trigger reasons for each status class.

Title: [BEN-01] Bench stress pack execution
Description: Run noise/tilt/lighting/toilet scenarios and generate MAE-RMSE comparison summary.

Title: [BEN-02] Leave-one-toilet-out generalization test
Description: Evaluate robustness across unseen toilets and propose mitigations for outlier failures.

Title: [DATA-01] Dataset lineage and leakage validation
Description: Publish dataset card, split strategy, and leakage check report with signed review.

Title: [SEC-01] Pilot threat and privacy risk workshop
Description: Create risk register with owners, severities, and mitigation deadlines.

Title: [ETH-01] ICF package finalization for site submission
Description: Finalize ICF language with PI and legal review; prepare versioned approval copy.

Title: [ETH-02] eCRF build and data dictionary approval
Description: Implement eCRF fields from dictionary and validate mandatory logic before pilot dry run.

Title: [ETH-03] Data handling appendix and retention controls
Description: Approve retention, de-identification, and role-based access controls for pilot dataset.

Title: [CLN-02] Statistical Analysis Plan v1.0
Description: Freeze SAP with primary and secondary endpoint methods before first patient enrolled.

Title: [GOV-02] Claims governance rollout to product and marketing
Description: Adopt claim registry and release gate checks for app UI, report templates, and website text.

Title: [QA-01] Pilot release checklist and DHF index
Description: Publish checklist and evidence index; close all blocking compliance gaps.

Title: [DRY-01] Clinical dry-run sessions (10-15 records)
Description: Execute dry-run protocol and capture corrective action list with owners and deadlines.

Title: [DRY-02] Model freeze release fusion_v0.1.0
Description: Freeze model artifact and add hash injection into every generated summary report.

Title: [DRY-03] End-to-end audit trail verification
Description: Verify each session is traceable to app version, model hash, config, and operator action logs.

Title: [DRY-04] Incident response tabletop drill
Description: Run access breach drill and close resulting corrective actions.

Title: [OPS-01] Pilot kickoff runbook and handoff
Description: Deliver single runbook covering SOP flow, escalation, contacts, and daily reporting format.

Title: [GATE-01] Go-NoGo governance board decision
Description: Hold formal board review and publish signed go/no-go decision with blockers or launch approval.
